name: Legend of Zelda: Mystery of Solarus DX
name_original: Legend of Zelda: Mystery of Solarus DX
description:
Legend of Zelda: Mystery of Solarus DX is an action game developed by Solarus. It came out on 16-12-2011. It was published by Solarus. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Legend of Zelda: Mystery of Solarus DX is available on PC.
